title: Listings.Express
author: Listings.Express
created_time: July 21, 2022, 10:58:44 AMLast edit: July 26, 2022, 07:43:43 AM by Listings.Express
content: We Provide a Fast Track CMC and Coingecko Listing ServiceNo Upfront FeesOnly Pay Once Listed - Free Marketing Assets When We List Your Token on CMC.We do not work with resellers, We work directly with agents in listing platforms to get you listed in 24 hours.CMC - $2995Coingecko - $1295Get in touch with us today https://listings.express/Message us direct on Telegram @listingsexpress

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: Listings.Express on July 21, 2022, 10:58:44 AMCMC - $2995Coingecko - $795Listing on these platforms is Free. To confirm your competence, make a listing of this coin.Shitcoin 3.0: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=740159.0 (This is an active project)

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Yea, most listing agents write similar things and they could list within 24 hours. But if give them work, they say, patience sir, ongoing process bla bla bla. I have tried with a couple of listing agents, but all are fake. They tried by themselves if get listed they ask for money. Likely 10% of their project get listed successfully and they claim they list with an insider. Anyway, Coingecko doesn't need anything if can apply properly though CMC is quite complicated.

comments.author: Listings.Express
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on July 21, 2022, 08:11:10 PMQuote from: Listings.Express on July 21, 2022, 10:58:44 AMCMC - $2995Coingecko - $795Listing on these platforms is Free. To confirm your competence, make a listing of this coin.Shitcoin 3.0: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=740159.0 (This is an active project)Are you the project owner? Feel free to submit your project info on our website, and we'll be more than happy to move things forward - https://listings.express/

comments.author: Listings.Express
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on July 21, 2022, 08:24:40 PMYea, most listing agents write similar things and they could list within 24 hours. But if give them work, they say, patience sir, ongoing process bla bla bla. I have tried with a couple of listing agents, but all are fake. They tried by themselves if get listed they ask for money. Likely 10% of their project get listed successfully and they claim they list with an insider. Anyway, Coingecko doesn't need anything if can apply properly though CMC is quite complicated. Hi Cryptovator, Thank you for replying. Some what cynical response, however we have a "No Risk, No Fee" policy, so there is no risk for the applicant.I cannot comment on other agents you have dealt with, or their level of english, but we do try to maintain a professional and transparent service, and most tokens are listed within hours.If you have any projects coming up that you're working on in future, feel free to reach out on telegram https://t.me/listingsexpress

comments.author: keyscore44
comments.body: Quote from: Listings.Express on July 22, 2022, 11:26:49 AMQuote from: The Cryptovator on July 21, 2022, 08:24:40 PMYea, most listing agents write similar things and they could list within 24 hours. But if give them work, they say, patience sir, ongoing process bla bla bla. I have tried with a couple of listing agents, but all are fake. They tried by themselves if get listed they ask for money. Likely 10% of their project get listed successfully and they claim they list with an insider. Anyway, Coingecko doesn't need anything if can apply properly though CMC is quite complicated. Hi Cryptovator, Thank you for replying. Some what cynical response, however we have a "No Risk, No Fee" policy, so there is no risk for the applicant.I cannot comment on other agents you have dealt with, or their level of english, but we do try to maintain a professional and transparent service, and most tokens are listed within hours.If you have any projects coming up that you're working on in future, feel free to reach out on telegram https://t.me/listingsexpress  Does the service have to be purchased for both services (Coinmarketcap and Coingecko) at the same time, or can it be purchased only for Coingecko, for example?I understand that you take responsibility for your words. So what happens if a project is not listed on Coinmarketcap or Coingecko within 24 hours?

comments.author: Listings.Express
comments.body: No you dont need to purchase both services, you can order individually.If a project cant be listed we will usually tell you before hand once we've discussed it with you, however rejections are rare unless there has been an oversight. Also 90% of our projects are listed within 24 hours (1 working day) however we always advise clients 1-2 working days.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: You are charging thousands of dollars for something that is free is this article lying when they write that listing in Coinmarketcap is free, this article comes from Coinmarketcap CoinMarketCap Listing Is FREEQuoteCoinMarketCap listings are always free. Please beware of spoofed emails, fake social accounts, or individuals requesting listing fees. Anyone asking you to pay a fee or tip for getting your project listed on CoinMarketCap is definitely not sanctioned to do so. We also do not sanction any listing service to assist in the listing application of any cryptoasset project or exchange. All you have to do is to apply using this link https://support.coinmarketcap.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000493112

comments.author: Listings.Express
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on July 24, 2022, 10:37:07 AMYou are charging thousands of dollars for something that is free is this article lying when they write that listing in Coinmarketcap is free, this article comes from Coinmarketcap CoinMarketCap Listing Is FREEQuoteCoinMarketCap listings are always free. Please beware of spoofed emails, fake social accounts, or individuals requesting listing fees. Anyone asking you to pay a fee or tip for getting your project listed on CoinMarketCap is definitely not sanctioned to do so. We also do not sanction any listing service to assist in the listing application of any cryptoasset project or exchange. All you have to do is to apply using this link https://support.coinmarketcap.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000493112The article doesnt lie, no. However its well known that cmc listings can sometimes take 2 weeks , and many are often rejected. A High proportion of projects struggle to make it past 5 days without a listing.The point of our service is to expedite the whole process. Please read the content on our website thoroughly, and once again we do not charge "thousands of dollars" upfront fees. https://listings.express/Just because someone or a company says something is not possible, doesnt mean it cannot be done. There are shortcuts to everything in this crypto world, as many experienced people here will know.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Listings.Express on July 24, 2022, 11:30:59 AMQuote from: Saisher on July 24, 2022, 10:37:07 AMYou are charging thousands of dollars for something that is free is this article lying when they write that listing in Coinmarketcap is free, this article comes from Coinmarketcap CoinMarketCap Listing Is FREEQuoteCoinMarketCap listings are always free. Anyone asking you to pay a fee or tip for getting your project listed on CoinMarketCap is definitely not sanctioned to do so. We also do not sanction any listing service to assist in the listing application of any cryptoasset project or exchange. All you have to do is to apply using this link https://support.coinmarketcap.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000493112The article doesnt lie, no. However its well known that cmc listings can sometimes take 2 weeks , and many are often rejected. A High proportion of projects struggle to make it past 5 days without a listing.The point of our service is to expedite the whole process. Please read the content on our website thoroughly, and once again we do not charge "thousands of dollars" upfront fees. https://listings.express/Just because someone or a company says something is not possible, doesnt mean it cannot be done. There are shortcuts to everything in this crypto world, as many experienced people here will know.If I'm the developer or a coin owner I'll prefer to wait for 5 to 7 days than spend thousands of dollars and spend the money I save on marketing and on my platform, I don't know what shortcut is this but are you implying that you can bribe the Coinmarketcap team with your so-called short cut, unless there are testimonials from developers you've helped that your service is good even though they are rejected this service is useless.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on July 25, 2022, 12:45:03 AMQuote from: Listings.Express on July 24, 2022, 11:30:59 AMQuote from: Saisher on July 24, 2022, 10:37:07 AMYou are charging thousands of dollars for something that is free is this article lying when they write that listing in Coinmarketcap is free, this article comes from Coinmarketcap CoinMarketCap Listing Is FREEQuoteCoinMarketCap listings are always free. Please read the content on our website thoroughly, and once again we do not charge "thousands of dollars" upfront fees. https://listings.express/Just because someone or a company says something is not possible, doesnt mean it cannot be done. There are shortcuts to everything in this crypto world, as many experienced people here will know.If I'm the developer or a coin owner I'll prefer to wait for 5 to 7 days than spend thousands of dollars and spend the money I save on marketing and on my platform, I don't know what shortcut is this but are you implying that you can bribe the Coinmarketcap team with your so-called short cut, unless there are testimonials from developers you've helped that your service is good even though they are rejected this service is useless.Agree. Doesn't make sense to hurry things while its bear market anyway. Its a waste of money when you can list your project in a week or two for free. But I'm might be considering it if I'm a developer and would like it timely listed to good news that's coming while also in the bull market. I have been approached in linkedin if I can list a tokens on CMC, not sure why the employer asked me about it but this is a good service to outsource if someone approaches and will just get a cut.  I wonder if OP is open for this. May I ask which coins have you listed there since?

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: Everything is on compliancy, if a project can give all the information and all the requirements both Coinmarketcap and Coingecko are asking I don't see why they will not be listed, if you can enlist a coin that was rejected then there is corruption on these two market aggregator what can you do that those developers cannot do when they stated that its free to list and they give all applicants a form to fill up.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Listings.Express on July 29, 2022, 08:33:26 PMBumpI don't think you are going to get any clients by just bypassing or not addressing your bad feedback, that's bad for your business this thread is useless to get a bump with all the proof that you are trying to sell an overpriced service and not posting any coin that you've helped to get listed after that coin was rejected by both Coinmarketcap and Coingecko
